Posts.Content: TLF wrote: I went in for my first annual mammogram at age 40 and came out with a cancer dx.  I just want to know if there is anyone whom at this stage whom have beat the odds and kicked cancer in the butt for 10 - 20 years. Please share. Dx 8/17/2009, IDC, 1cm, Stage II, Grade 2, 4/26 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone 10 or 20 year surviror at this Stage TLF Padiddle
